welcome_message_body: "Welcome to Loja, Ecuador! Get ready to be charmed by our beautiful colonial architecture, vibrant arts scene, and stunning natural landscapes. We invite you to explore and enjoy all that our city has to offer."

terminals.name: Main Terminal
terminals.description: The main terminal at Camilo Ponce Enríquez Airport, serving both domestic and international flights.

terminals.name: Cargo Terminal
terminals.description: The cargo terminal at Camilo Ponce Enríquez Airport, handling all cargo and freight operations.

wifi.note: Free WiFi is available throughout the airport.
